text: Called Back is a 1914 American silent drama film directed by Otis Turner and starring Herbert Rawlinson, Ann Little and Allan Forrest.Katchmer p.811 It is based on the 1833 novel Called Back, which was also adapted into a British film Called Back the same year. ==Cast== * Herbert Rawlinson as Gilbert Vaughan * Ann Little as Pauline March * Allan Forrest as Anthony March * William Worthington as Dr. Manuel Ceneri * William Quinn as Signor Macari ==References== ==Bibliography== * George A. Katchmer. Eighty Silent Film Stars: Biographies and Filmographies of the Obscure to the Well Known. McFarland, 1991. ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 drama films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Otis Turner Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films set in London Category:Universal Pictures films
title: Called Back (1914 American film)
